definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[שָׁגִיתִי]] Job 6:24, Job 19:4, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשְׁגֶּה]] Pr 5:23, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[שְׁגוֹת]] Pr 19:27; Pt. [[שׁׂגֶה]] Ez Eze 45:20, Pr 20:1, etc.;—
err, stray, of flock Ez Eze 34:6 (fig.).
swerve, meander, reel or roll, in drunkenness, [[ב]] of drink Is 28:7, Is 28:7; = be intoxicated, Pr 20:1; so with ([[בּ]]) love Pr 5:19, Pr 5:20; [[בָּרׂאֶה]] ´[[שׁ]]: Is 28:7.

go astay, morally, 1Sa 26:21, Pr 5:23, Job 6:24, Job 19:4, + 1Sa 14:24 (rdg. [[שְׁגׇגׇה]] ´[[שׁ]]:) Th We Dr Now (after LXX; otherwise Bu HPS); c. [[מן]], of ´[[י]]:’s commands Ps 119:21, Ps 119:118, [[מִן]] of words of knowledge Pr 19:27.
specif. commit sin of ignorance, inadvertence Le 4:13, Nu 15:22 (P) Ez Eze 45:20 (cf. [[שׁגג]]).

morally, Pt. Pr 28:10 ([[בְּדֶרֶךְ רָָע]]); Impf. 2 ms. sf. [[תַּשְׁגֵּנִי]], c. [[מן]] of God’s commands Ps 119:10; + perhaps Job 12:23 leadeth nations astray (LXX SvrVer, i.e. [[וַיַּשְׁגֵּם]] for [[וַיַּנְחֵם]]).
